npcs.name: Alderman Thornhaven
npcs.title: Merchant Prince
npcs.description: A wealthy merchant known for fair dealings and shrewd business acumen. Currently missing under mysterious circumstances.
npcs.appearance: Well-dressed middle-aged man with graying hair and a neatly trimmed beard. Often seen wearing expensive but practical clothing.
npcs.personality: Professional, fair-minded, and known for keeping his word in business dealings.
npcs.background: Built the Thornhaven Trading Company from a small family business into one of Waterdeep's prominent merchant houses.

notes.text: Last seen heading to a meeting at the Salty Dog Tavern

npcs.name: Marcus Thornhaven
npcs.title: Acting Head of Thornhaven Trading
npcs.description: Younger brother of Alderman Thornhaven, thrust into leadership of the company following his brother's disappearance.
npcs.appearance: Younger version of his brother, but with more worried lines on his face lately. Dresses in fine merchant's clothes.
npcs.personality: Anxious but competent. Deeply worried about his brother while trying to maintain the family business.
npcs.background: Always worked in his brother's shadow but is proving himself capable in crisis.

notes.text: Offered reward for information about his brother

npcs.name: Captain Alicia Strongheart
npcs.title: Captain of the City Watch
npcs.description: Veteran captain of the City Watch, responsible for maintaining order in the Trade Ward.
npcs.appearance: Tall woman in her forties wearing the polished armor of the City Watch. Carries herself with military precision.
npcs.personality: Professional and direct. Takes her duties seriously but knows when to look the other way for the greater good.
npcs.background: Rose through the ranks of the City Watch through dedication and competence.
